charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had a Pokémon battle
against May’s Kyogre.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0200: That sure was a fun battle!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0400:
Seems these Pokémon of legends truly are all
they’re cracked up to be.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0500: I’ve studied the legends of Hoenn!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0600:
According to them, Kyogre is the personification
of the sea itself.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0700:
They say it widened the seas by causing
downpours!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0800:
Not only that—Kyogre can become even more
powerful through Primal Reversion!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_0900:
In fact, that’s supposedly its true power—the form
it took in legends!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_0302_1200: Does it require a strong bond?
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_0402_1300:
Good guess, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re on the right track!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_1400:
But Primal Reversion is actually different from
Mega Evolution.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_1500:
For Mega Evolution, you need a Key Stone and a
Mega Stone to resonate with a Pokémon and
Trainer’s bond.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_1600:
But Primal Reversion has more to do with the
energy of nature!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_1700:
Of course, I don’t know how much of that is true,
since it’s still being researched.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_1800:
I have a long way to go, both as a Trainer and as
a researcher.
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_1900:
But I hope to give future generations accurate
knowledge of Kyogre!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_2000:
I’ll use our time together as a sync pair to
observe it...
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_2100: and hopefully grow closer to my goal!
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_2300: As a Pasio Neo Champion and Kyogre’s Trainer...
charaepi_ch0126_90_haruka/2301_1201_2400: I’d love it if you cheered me on!
